description: Department of Labour -The Cost of Living Index No. for the Month of August, 2013 for Tea; Cocoa, Cardamam and Pepper; Rubber Growing and Manufacturing Trade was 176.2 - Special Allowance payable to workers in the Cocoa, Cardamom and Pepper growing and manufacturing trade for the month of September, 2013 is Rs. 541.62 for a normal working day
